short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and play videos from any websites, watch together and have fun with your friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A must have extension when watching videos together on https://joy2g.net.

Features:
+ Easily add videos to your watch party from any website.
+ Works seamlessly with the Joy2g website.

How to use:
+ Install the Joy2g Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store.
+ Go to any website with a video that you want to watch together.
+ Click the Joy2g extension icon and select "Add video to Joy2g room."
+ Invite your friends and family to the watch party.
+ Start watching and enjoying the shared experience!

About Our Website (https://joy2g.net):
Watch videos together with friends and family from YouTube and any website on the internet,  no matter where they are in the world.
Experience synchronized playback and a built-in chat feature for seamless interactions.

We are constantly updating our platform and making it to be the most convenient for our users.
Hope you have great time with your friends & family on Joy2g platform!
